name: 蔡定江
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 應力、應變、能量、及失效。2. 厚壁圓筒。3. 圓盤對稱彎曲。4. 撓曲、反力、及能量法。5. 扭轉。6. 非對稱彎曲、剪力中心、及薄壁梁。7. 曲梁。8. 塑性崩潰、及極限分析。9. 梁 - 柱、挫曲、及非線性。
1. Stress, strain, energy, and failure. 2. Thick-walled cylinders. 3. Symmetric bending of circular plates.  4. Deflection, reactions, and energy methods. 5. Torsion. 6. Unsymmetric bending, shear center, and thin-walled beams. 7. Curved beams. 8. Plastic collapse and limit analysis. 9. Beam-columns, buckling, and nonlinearity.
schedule:
一 	Column, Elastic stability
二	Column, Elastic stability
三	Analysis of Stresses
四	Analysis of Stresses
五	Analysis of Stresses
六	Analysis of strains
七	Analysis of strains
八	Analysis of strains
九	Stress-strain relations
十	Energy methods
十一	Energy methods
十二	Energy methods
十三	Asymmetric Bending of beams and curved beams
十四	Asymmetric Bending of beams and curved beams
十五	Torsion
十六	Thick-walled Cylinders and Disks
十七	Collapse analysis
十八	期末考
scorePolicy:
1 出缺席考核與學習態度 (10%)
2 期中考 (30%) x2
3 期末考 (30%)
materials:
1. Intermediate Mechanics of material, by J. R. Barber, McGraw-Hill, 2000.
2. Mechanics of Materials, by Andrew Pytel, Jaan Kiusalaas - Google Books
consultation: 時間：每週二 5678 節地點：綜合科館 112-6 室
